message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm asking $100 for it.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $80 is my minimum, I'm willing to come up a bit to $90.  This is still a good deal for you, given the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
